title: British Airways launches special offer for SMEs | Buying Business Travel
text:
0 comments Rob Gill Tue, 22 Sep 2015 17:25 Follow @BBT_online British Airways is offering extra bonus points for members of its On Business loyalty programme for SMEs.
The airline said that members can earn 50 per cent extra bonus points on flights booked across the BA, Iberia and American Airlinesâ€™ networks over the next three months.
The promotion, which is the first special offer since BA relaunched On Business earlier this year, applies to eligible flights booked and flown from now until December 15.
Business travellers will collect On Business points for the benefit of their organisation, which can then be redeemed for future upgrades with British Airways and Iberia, as well as reward seats on BA, American and Iberia networks.
For example, 9,000 On Business points can be redeemed for a return economy flight from Heathrow to New York.
More details are available on the On Business website
